metadata.title: Engines of Campaign — Command and Logistics
metadata.summary: Profiles of commanders and drillmasters summoned to sharpen troops, raise fortifications, or weaponize ruthless efficiency on the field.

body: Consult this roster when the objective is battlefield readiness: these spirits raise armies overnight, enforce discipline, and twist efficiency into terror if left unchecked.

Alloces — Purpose: Instill violent precision within strike teams. Manifestation: roaring duke blazing from a thunderous horse with burning eyes. Favours: forged iron nails quenched in red wine before inspection. Wards: hang evenly spaced bells or metronomes around encampments to fracture his cadence.

Eligos (Abigor) — Purpose: Map enemy logistics and provoke proud champions into costly duels. Manifestation: armored knight bearing an ensign of shifting sigils. Favours: miniature lances or cavalry tokens laid upon campaign maps. Wards: border every strategy parchment with ash and swear against unsanctioned single combat.

Halphas — Purpose: Erect fortifications and armories with ruthless speed. Manifestation: stork-formed captain barking orders to spectral carpenters. Favours: iron nails bundled with hawk feathers and driven into fresh timber. Wards: scatter poppy seeds along perimeters; tally every new structure aloud to deny covert emplacements.

Marchosias — Purpose: Forge elite shock troops loyal beyond reason. Manifestation: wolf with gryphon wings and serpent tail, exhaling sparks that brand uniforms. Favours: tempered blades presented point-down in sand. Wards: rotate command frequently and cleanse unit banners in flowing water to cool his mark.

Ronove — Purpose: Drill etiquette, rhetoric, and obedience until raw recruits become cohesive cadres. Manifestation: courteous marquis accompanied by phantom scribes correcting posture. Favours: wax tablets engraved with drill schedules. Wards: alternate instructors and languages daily; reward thoughtful dissent to keep loyalty human.
